Take some time to learn some things...

One of the quickest ways to indpendence is to be more independent. It is AMAZING how much money you can save when doing things yourself rather than having others do the work for you. This is our first piece of advice on your journey to early retirement and becoming financially free. Click on a section below to begin your learning journey.

Adulting

Whether it is learning how to boil an egg or changing your own tire, we've got you covered! Learn to cook your own meals, basic home maintainence, and much more.

Learn More...

Financial Freedom

Learn to become financially independent!From getting unburied from debt to retiring early, learn how to hone your financial skills so you have spare money in your bank account.

Learn More...

Gardening

Whether you have lots of space or almost none, you can garden! You can garden in your apartment or in your home. We garden right here in the city.

Learn More...

Homesteading

A great way to be more independent is to work on making more yourself. Actually know what is in your food - you may actually like the taste of food without all of the preseveratives in it.

Learn More...

These are great techniques to learn to save money. Now I've got plenty of money for my vacation to Jamica.

Daniel Somebody Baltimore, MD

I loved your adulting class. I wish they would have taught us this in high school. Now I cook my own meals rather than ordering out every night.

Jane Amazon Chatanooga, TN

This gave me the courage to start gardening in my apartment. Now I have plenty of fresh spices to cook with!

John Smith Fort Wayne, TX

It has been a lot of fun learning how to can my own food. It allows me to buy food from the store on sale and store it for later without needing another freezer.

Jamie Sweetsuckle Arlington, VA
